parts.text: {"word":"overseeable","priority":"☆☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"監督可能な、監視可能な、管理可能な","english_definition":"Capable of being overseen; able to be supervised or managed.","examples":[{"sentence":"The project was easily overseeable due to its clear objectives.","translation":"そのプロジェクトは、目標が明確だったため、容易に監督可能だった。"},{"sentence":"With the right tools, even complex tasks become overseeable.","translation":"適切なツールがあれば、複雑なタスクでさえ監督可能になる。"},{"sentence":"The new system made the entire process more overseeable.","translation":"新しいシステムによって、プロセス全体がより管理しやすくなった。"}],"collocations":["easily overseeable (容易に監督可能な)","readily overseeable (容易に監督可能な)","more overseeable (より監督可能な)","less overseeable (より監督不能な)"],"synonyms":["manageable","supervisable","controllable","administrable","monitorable"],"antonyms":["unmanageable","unsupervisable","uncontrollable","unadministrable"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"見渡せる、見晴らせる","english_definition":"Affording a view; able to be viewed from above.","examples":[{"sentence":"The hill made the entire valley overseeable.","translation":"その丘からは谷全体を見渡せた。"},{"sentence":"From the tower, the city was completely overseeable.","translation":"塔からは街全体を見晴らせた。"}],"collocations":["completely overseeable (完全に見渡せる)","easily overseeable (容易に見渡せる)"],"synonyms":["visible","viewable","observable","discernible"],"antonyms":["hidden","obscured","unseen"]}],"etymology":{"value":"Derived from the verb 'oversee' (to supervise) and the suffix '-able' (capable of being).","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌoʊvərˈsiːəbəl/","syllables":"o-ver-see-a-ble"},"inflection":{"adjective_forms":{"comparative":"more overseeable","superlative":"most overseeable"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"The word 'overseeable' is not very common, and its usage is generally limited to formal or technical contexts. It is most often used to describe something that can be easily supervised or managed. The second meaning, 'affording a view,' is less common.","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The overseeable saw the valley.","correct":"✓ The hill made the valley overseeable.","note":"'Overseeable' is an adjective, not a noun. It modifies a noun to describe its quality of being supervisable or viewable."},{"incorrect":"✗ The project was overseeable by the manager.","correct":"✓ The project was easily overseeable.","note":"The word describes the project itself, not the person doing the overseeing. The correct phrasing would be 'The project was easily overseeable' or 'The manager could easily oversee the project'."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["oversee (verb: to supervise)","overseer (noun: supervisor)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C2","frequency_google_ngram":"Low frequency","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"'Overseeable' is a relatively uncommon adjective that means something can be easily supervised or managed. It is formed by combining 'oversee' (to supervise) and '-able' (capable of). It's often used in professional or technical contexts to describe the manageability of a project, task, or process. It can also mean something is easily visible or offers a good view, but this usage is less common.","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The software's intuitive interface made the data analysis easily **overseeable**.","translation":"そのソフトウェアの直感的なインターフェースにより、データ分析が容易に監督可能になった。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"監督可能な"},{"sentence":"The new management system ensured that all operations were **overseeable** and efficient.","translation":"新しい管理システムにより、すべての業務が監督可能かつ効率的になった。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"監督可能な"},{"sentence":"From the hilltop, the entire valley was **overseeable**.","translation":"丘の上からは、谷全体を見渡せた。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"見渡せる"}]}
